00070   char *line_read = 0;
00071 
00072   bool gTestMode = false;
00073   std::string gInputStr;
00074 
00075   char *rl_gets () {
00076 
00077     if (gTestMode) {
00078       if (!getline(cin, gInputStr))
00079         return 0;
00080       boost::trim(gInputStr);
00081       if (gInputStr.find("echo", 0) != 0 && gInputStr.find("quit", 0) != 0)
00082         cout << gInputStr << endl;
00083       return (char *)gInputStr.c_str();
00084     }
00085     else {
00086       if (line_read) {
00087         free (line_read);
00088         line_read = (char *)NULL;
00089       }
00090 
00091       /* Get a line from the user. */
00092       line_read = readline("hyperspace> ");
00093 
00094       /* If the line has any text in it, save it on the history. */
00095       if (line_read && *line_read)
00096         add_history (line_read);
00097 
00098       return line_read;
00099     }
00100   }

00102   const char *usage[] = {
00103     "usage: hyperspace [OPTIONS]",
00104     "",
00105     "OPTIONS:",
00106     "  --config=<file>  Read configuration from <file>.  The default config file is",
00107     "                   \"conf/hypertable.cfg\" relative to the toplevel install",
00108     "                   directory",
00109     "  --debug          Turn on debugging output",
00110     "  --eval <cmds>    Evaluates the commands in the string <cmds>.  Several",
00111     "                   commands can be supplied in <cmds> by separating them with",
00112     "                   semicolons",
00113     "  --no-prompt      Don't display a command prompt",
00114     "  --notification-address=[<host>:]<port>  Send notification datagram to this",
00115     "                   address after each command.",
00116     "  --help           Display this help text and exit",
00117     "  --test-mode      Suppress file line number information from error messages to",
00118     "                   simplify diff'ing test output.",
00119     "",
00120     "This is a command interpreter for Hyperspace, a global namespace and lock service",
00121     "for loosely-coupled distributed systems.",
00122     (const char *)0
00123   };
00124

00127     "  Display <str> to stdout.",
00128     "",
00129     "help",
00130     "  Display this help text.",
00131     "",
00132     "quit",
00133     "  Exit the program.",
00134     "",
00135     (const char *)0

00142 class Notifier {
00143 
00144 public:
00145 
00146   Notifier(const char *addressStr) {
00147     DispatchHandlerPtr nullHandler(0);
00148     int error;
00149     m_comm = new Comm();
00150     if (!InetAddr::initialize(&m_addr, addressStr)) {
00151       exit(1);
00152     }
00153     InetAddr::initialize(&m_send_addr, INADDR_ANY, 0);
00154     if ((error = m_comm->create_datagram_receive_socket(&m_send_addr, nullHandler)) != Error::OK) {
00155       std::string str;
00156       HT_ERRORF("Problem creating UDP receive socket %s - %s", InetAddr::string_format(str, m_send_addr), Error::get_text(error));
00157       exit(1);
00158     }
00159   }
00160 
00161   Notifier() : m_comm(0) {
00162     return;
00163   }
00164 
00165   void notify() {
00166     if (m_comm) {
00167       int error;
00168       CommBufPtr cbufPtr( new CommBuf(m_builder, 2) );
00169       cbufPtr->append_short(0);
00170       if ((error = m_comm->send_datagram(m_addr, m_send_addr, cbufPtr)) != Error::OK) {
00171         HT_ERRORF("Problem sending datagram - %s", Error::get_text(error));
00172         exit(1);
00173       }
00174     }
00175   }
00176 
00177 private:
00178   Comm *m_comm;
00179   struct sockaddr_in m_addr;
00180   struct sockaddr_in m_send_addr;
00181   HeaderBuilder m_builder;
00182 };

00188 class SessionHandler : public SessionCallback {
00189 public:
00190   virtual void jeopardy() { cout << "SESSION CALLBACK: Jeopardy" << endl << flush; }
00191   virtual void safe() { cout << "SESSION CALLBACK: Safe" << endl << flush; }
00192   virtual void expired() { cout << "SESSION CALLBACK: Expired" << endl << flush; }
00193 };

00200 int main(int argc, char **argv, char **envp) {
00201   const char *line;
00202   char *eval = 0;
00203   size_t i;
00204   string configFile = "";
00205   vector<InteractiveCommand *>  commands;
00206   Comm *comm;
00207   PropertiesPtr props_ptr;
00208   Hyperspace::Session *session;
00209   SessionHandler sessionHandler;
00210   bool verbose = false;
00211   int error;
00212   Notifier *notifier = 0;
00213 
00214   System::initialize(argv[0]);
00215   ReactorFactory::initialize((uint16_t)System::get_processor_count());
00216 
00217   configFile = System::installDir + "/conf/hypertable.cfg";
00218 
00219   for (int i=1; i<argc; i++) {
00220     if (!strncmp(argv[i], "--config=", 9))
00221       configFile = &argv[i][9];
00222     else if (!strcmp(argv[i], "--debug"))
00223       verbose = true;
00224     else if (!strcmp(argv[i], "--eval")) {
00225       i++;
00226       if (i == argc)
00227         Usage::dump_and_exit(usage);
00228       eval = argv[i];
00229     }
00230     else if (!strcmp(argv[i], "--test-mode")) {
00231       Logger::set_test_mode("hyperspace");
00232       gTestMode = true;
00233     }
00234     else if (!strncmp(argv[i], "--notification-address=", 23))
00235       notifier = new Notifier(&argv[i][23]);
00236     else
00237       Usage::dump_and_exit(usage);
00238   }
00239 
00240   if (notifier == 0)
00241     notifier = new Notifier();
00242 
00243   props_ptr = new Properties( configFile );
00244 
00245   if (verbose)
00246     props_ptr->set("Hypertable.Verbose", "true");
00247 
00248   comm = new Comm();
00249 
00250   session = new Session(comm, props_ptr, &sessionHandler);
00251 
00252   if (!session->wait_for_connection(30)) {
00253     cerr << "Unable to establish session with Hyerspace, exiting..." << endl;
00254     exit(1);
00255   }
00256 
00257   commands.push_back( new CommandMkdir(session) );
00258   commands.push_back( new CommandDelete(session) );
00259   commands.push_back( new CommandOpen(session) );
00260   commands.push_back( new CommandCreate(session) );
00261   commands.push_back( new CommandClose(session) );
00262   commands.push_back( new CommandAttrSet(session) );
00263   commands.push_back( new CommandAttrGet(session) );
00264   commands.push_back( new CommandAttrDel(session) );
00265   commands.push_back( new CommandExists(session) );
00266   commands.push_back( new CommandReaddir(session) );
00267   commands.push_back( new CommandLock(session) );
00268   commands.push_back( new CommandTryLock(session) );
00269   commands.push_back( new CommandRelease(session) );
00270   commands.push_back( new CommandGetSequencer(session) );
00271 
00275   if (eval != 0) {
00276     const char *str;
00277     std::string commandStr;
00278     str = strtok(eval, ";");
00279     while (str) {
00280       Global::exitStatus = 0;
00281       commandStr = str;
00282       boost::trim(commandStr);
00283       for (i=0; i<commands.size(); i++) {
00284         if (commands[i]->matches(commandStr.c_str())) {
00285           commands[i]->parse_command_line(commandStr.c_str());
00286           if ((error = commands[i]->run()) != Error::OK) {
00287             cerr << Error::get_text(error) << endl;
00288             return 1;
00289           }
00290           break;
00291         }
00292       }
00293       if (i == commands.size()) {
00294         HT_ERRORF("Unrecognized command : %s", commandStr.c_str());
00295         return 1;
00296       }
00297       str = strtok(0, ";");      
00298     }
00299     return Global::exitStatus;
00300   }
00301 
00302   cout << "Welcome to the Hyperspace command interpreter.  Hyperspace" << endl;
00303   cout << "is a global namespace and lock service for loosely-coupled" << endl;
00304   cout << "distributed systems.  Type 'help' for a description of commands." << endl;
00305   cout << endl << flush;
00306 
00307   using_history();
00308   while ((line = rl_gets()) != 0) {
00309 
00310     Global::exitStatus = 0;
00311 
00312     if (*line == 0)
00313       continue;
00314 
00315     for (i=0; i<commands.size(); i++) {
00316       if (commands[i]->matches(line)) {
00317         commands[i]->parse_command_line(line);
00318         if ((error = commands[i]->run()) != Error::OK && error != -1)
00319           cout << Error::get_text(error) << endl;
00320         notifier->notify();
00321         break;
00322       }
00323     }
00324 
00325     if (i == commands.size()) {
00326       if (!strcmp(line, "quit") || !strcmp(line, "exit")) {
00327         notifier->notify();
00328         exit(0);
00329       }
00330       else if (!strncmp(line, "echo", 4)) {
00331         std::string echoStr = std::string(line);
00332         echoStr = echoStr.substr(4);
00333         boost::trim_if(echoStr, boost::is_any_of("\" \t"));
00334         cout << echoStr << endl;
00335         notifier->notify();
00336       }
00337       else if (!strcmp(line, "pwd")) {
00338         cout << Global::cwd << endl;
00339         notifier->notify();
00340       }
00341       else if (!strcmp(line, "help")) {
00342         cout << endl;
00343         for (i=0; i<commands.size(); i++) {
00344           Usage::dump(commands[i]->usage());
00345           cout << endl;
00346         }
00347         Usage::dump(helpTrailer);
00348         notifier->notify();
00349       }
00350       else {
00351         cout << "Unrecognized command." << endl;
00352         notifier->notify();
00353       }
00354     }
00355   }
00356 
00357   delete session;
00358   delete comm;
00359   return Global::exitStatus;
00360 }
